title: Kinetic energy when boron bombarded by neutrons

content.question: When 10B is bombarded by neutrons, a neutron can be absorbed and an alpha particle (4He) emitted. If the 10B target is stationary, the kinetic energy of the reaction products is equal to the

choices.label: kinetic energy of the incident neutron
total energy of the incident neutron
energy equivalent of the mass decrease in the reaction
energy equivalent of the mass decrease in the reaction, minus the kinetic energy of the incident neutron
energy equivalent of the mass decrease in the reaction, plus the kinetic energy of the incident neutron

content.answer: energy equivalent of the mass decrease in the reaction, plus the kinetic energy of the incident neutron
